title: riot just made me dodge
body: i was first pick, made ban number 3 soraka.  while waiting for the other guy to ban, i opened a mastery page.  bad idea.  for some reason the soraka splash was still loaded, and i couldnt get it to go away.  it was sitting on top of the exit button for the mastery page, so i couldnt close it to pick a champ.  time went to 0 and i now i have to wait 5 min qq.
